summary: This is an email chain from June 23, 2021, discussing a BOP (Bureau of Prisons) Contraband Initiative. One participant notes that a colleague has been very busy with an Epstein investigation that must be finished by the end of the month, indicating ongoing investigative work related to Epstein at that time.

events.title: Epstein investigation deadline
events.description: An email states that a colleague has been very busy with the Epstein investigation that they have to finish by the end of the month.

events.title: BOP Contraband Initiative Zoom call

keyFacts: An email from June 23, 2021, references an ongoing Epstein investigation that must be finished by the end of that month.
The correspondence is related to a BOP (Bureau of Prisons) Contraband Initiative, indicating a separate but concurrent focus within the U.S. Attorney's Office.
The email chain involves personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, specifically mentioning the Public Corruption Unit.
All personal names and email addresses in the document are redacted, indicated by blanks or placeholder characters.
